attributes.action: Regulate the award of bonuses to financial executives of institutions that receive government assistance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As UK workers continue to lose their jobs, homes and automobiles; hard earned taxpayers money (that enabled the economic stimulus package and financial institution bailout) is being flushed away as executives shamefully pull down on bonuses.  This is irresponsibile and a poor use of taxpayers funds.  

It seems that bonuses are frequently disconnected between compensation and the long-term strategic success or failure of corporations

We request that you administer, control, regulate and place tighter restrictions on pay for executives of institutions that receive government assistance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
